title: Cruel Summer
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:00.76] (Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
[00:05.72] Fever dream high in the quiet of the night
[00:08.15] You know that I caught it
[00:11.45] Bad, bad boy
[00:12.38] Shiny toy with a price
[00:14.07] You know that I bought it
[00:16.36] Killing me slow, out the window
[00:19.17] I'm always waiting for you to be waiting below
[00:22.06] Devils roll the dice, angels roll their eyes
[00:24.62] What doesn't kill me makes me want you more
[00:27.81] And it's new, the shape of your body
[00:30.65] It's blue, the feeling I've got
[00:33.64] And it's ooh, whoa, oh
[00:36.58] It's a cruel summer
[00:39.25] It's cool, that's what I tell 'em
[00:42.09] No rules in breakable heaven
[00:44.92] But ooh, whoa oh
[00:47.98] It's a cruel summer
[00:50.53] With you
[00:53.78] Hang your head low
[00:54.85] In the glow of the vending machine
[00:56.63] I'm not dying
[00:59.17] You say that we'll just screw it up in these trying times
[01:02.57] We're not trying
[01:04.05] So cut the headlights, summer's a knife
[01:06.96] I'm always waiting for you just to cut to the bone
[01:10.07] Devils roll the dice, angels roll their eyes
[01:12.75] And if I bleed, you'll be the last to know
[01:15.56] Oh, it's new, the shape of your body
[01:18.82] It's blue, the feeling I've got
[01:21.69] And it's ooh, whoa, oh
[01:24.53] It's a cruel summer
[01:27.25] It's cool, that's what I tell 'em
[01:30.14] No rules in breakable heaven
[01:32.88] But ooh, whoa, oh
[01:35.83] It's a cruel summer
[01:38.52] With you
[01:39.34] I'm drunk in the back of the car
[01:41.30] And I cried like a baby coming home from the bar (oh)
[01:44.68] Said, "I'm fine," but it wasn't true
[01:47.17] I don't wanna keep secrets just to keep you
[01:50.12] And I snuck in through the garden gate
[01:52.63] Every night that summer just to seal my fate (oh)
[01:56.02] And I screamed for whatever it's worth
[01:58.41] "I love you," ain't that the worst thing you ever heard?
[02:01.89] He looks up grinning like a devil
[02:04.11] It's new, the shape of your body
[02:06.83] It's blue, the feeling I've got
[02:09.67] And it's ooh, whoa, oh
[02:12.55] It's a cruel summer
[02:15.32] It's cool, that's what I tell 'em
[02:18.13] No rules, in breakable heaven
[02:20.88] But ooh, whoa, oh
[02:23.89] It's a cruel summer
[02:26.50] With you
[02:27.33] I'm drunk in the back of the car
[02:29.46] And I cried like a baby coming home from the bar (oh)
[02:32.66] Said, "I'm fine," but it wasn't true
[02:34.99] I don't wanna keep secrets just to keep you
[02:37.82] And I snuck in through the garden gate
[02:40.68] Every night that summer just to seal my fate (oh)
[02:44.08] And I screamed for whatever it's worth
[02:46.36] "I love you," ain't that the worst thing you ever heard?
[02:50.13] (Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
[02:53.43]
